00025     double euclideanDistance(const std::vector<double>& v1, const std::vector<double>& v2)
00026     {
00027         double d = 0.0;
00028         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v1.size(); i++)
00029             d += (v1[i] - v2[i])*(v1[i] - v2[i]);
00030         return std::sqrt(d);
00031     }
00032 
00040     double manhattanDistance(const std::vector<double>& v1, const std::vector<double>& v2)
00041     {
00042         double d = 0.0;
00043         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v1.size(); i++)
00044             d += std::abs(v1[i] - v2[i]);
00045         return d;
00046     }
00047 
00055     double chebyshevDistance(const std::vector<double>& v1, const std::vector<double>& v2)
00056     {
00057         double d = 0.0, max = 0.0;
00058         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v1.size(); i++)
00059         {
00060             d = std::abs(v1[i] - v2[i]);
00061             if (d > max)
00062                 max = d;
00063         }
00064         return max;
00065     }
00066 
00074     double minkowskiDistance(const std::vector<double>& v1, const std::vector<double>& v2)
00075     {
00076         double d = 0.0, p = 0.33;
00077         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < v1.size(); i++)
00078             d += std::pow(std::abs(v1[i] - v2[i]), p);
00079 
00080         return std::pow(d, 1.0/p);
00081     }
